annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: New York Racing Association. The Company has an understanding with the New York Racing Association (“NYRA”) to manage video lottery terminals (“VLTs”) at NYRA's Aqueduct horseracing facility in metropolitan New York. The Company would assist in the development of the facility, including providing project financing, and would manage the facility for a fee. Work was halted on the VLT facility in August 2003 pending the outcome of an investigation of certain aspects of NYRA's operations by Federal prosecutors. In December 2003, NYRA reached agreement with the Justice Department whereby NYRA was indicted with prosecution deferred. NYRA agreed to pay a fine and the indictment will be dismissed with prejudice upon NYRA implementing certain reforms and otherwise complying with the terms of the agreement. The Company's participation is subject to a definitive agreement, regulatory approvals and certain legislative changes by the State of New York.
annotations.translation: 纽约赛车协会。该公司与纽约赛车协会（“NYRA”）达成谅解，管理位于纽约大都会的NYRA渡槽赛马设施的视频彩票终端（“VLT”）。该公司将协助该设施的开发，包括提供项目融资，并将收费管理该设施。在联邦检察官对NYRA行动的某些方面的调查得出结果之前，VLT设施的施工于2003年8月停止。2003年12月，NYRA与司法部达成协议，根据该协议，NYRA被起诉，起诉被推迟。NYRA同意支付罚款，起诉书将被驳回，这会影响NYRA实施某些改革并以其他方式遵守协议条款。公司的参与须经纽约州的最终协议、监管部门的批准和某些立法变更。

annotations.text: The Residences at MGM Grand. In July 2004, the venture obtained construction financing for up to $210 million for the development of the first tower. The Company has provided a guaranty for up to 50% of the interest and principal payment obligations on the construction financing as well as a joint and several completion guaranty with its partners. The Company recorded the value of the guaranty obligation, approximately $2 million, in other long-term liabilities.

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Other Guarantees. The Company is party to various guarantee contracts in the normal course of business, which are generally supported by letters of credit issued by financial institutions. The Company's Senior Credit Facility limits the amount of letters of credit that can be issued to $200 million, and the amount of available borrowings under the Senior Credit Facility is reduced by any outstanding letters of credit. At December 31, 2004, the Company had provided a $50 million letter of credit to support the Economic Development Corporation of the City of Detroit bonds referred to above, which are a liability of the Company.
annotations.translation: 其他担保。本公司在正常经营过程中订立各种担保合同，一般以金融机构开具的信用证作为担保。本公司的高级信贷融通将可发行的信用证金额限制为$2亿，高级信贷融通下的可用借款金额将减少任何未偿信用证。截至2004年12月31日，公司提供了$5000万的信用证，以支持上述底特律市经济发展公司的债券，该债券是公司的债务。
